ygData.subject: Perl + Gemchopper in tool box = nothing... =|
ygData.msgSnippet: Got some diamond dust off an ice giant during a Vox raid last night. Combined the proper stuff and sure enough came up with a gem chopper. Like a good gnome I
ygData.messageBody:
Got some diamond dust off an ice giant during a Vox raid last night.
Combined the proper stuff and sure enough came up with a gem chopper.

Like a good gnome I immediately sacrificed it to the great tool box in
the sky by combining a perl and the gem chopper in a tool box...
nothing... chopper gone...

Verant Bastards, give us shit and dont tell us what the hell its for...
=|

Cheers,

FizzWizz of Tunare
